name: Jordan Example
headline: Warm, witty, and intentional — here for something real.

questions.q: What are you most proud of?
questions.a: Building a life I’m genuinely at peace with.

questions.q: What does a great first date look like?
questions.a: Something simple where we can actually talk.

questions.q: What are you looking for right now?
questions.a: A partner with emotional maturity and real intention.
